author: wsjcom
title: More Cowardly Murders Will Not Bring Peace - WSJ
text: If Mahmoud Abbas deplored the torching of Joseph’s Tomb, it was only because Hamas had instigated the action (“Palestinians Set Jewish Shrine Ablaze in Protest,” World News, Oct. 17). Mr. Abbas has been a full participant in creating the culture in which the Palestinian refugees have been fed a constant diet of anti-Jewish invective, spewed from classrooms, mosques and media outlets. Mr. Abbas, like other Palestinian leaders, gives the highest honors to people who have killed Jews. He has said that he blesses every drop of blood spilled in the struggle to defend the Al Aqsa Mosque (which isn’t in any danger from... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
